anime.description: Note: Aired as part of the Anime-chan ni Kaeru Kuni (アニメちゃんに会える国) television variety program on Japan`s Tokyo MX1 channel.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: Episode 4
episode.summary: Momotarou, played by Porcini, arrives at Onigashima along with Monkey and Dog. There, they prepare to fight the leader of the oni. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 3
episode.summary: The Five perform the Japanese folktale, "Momotarou," in which Porcini plays the part of a mighty boy born from a peach. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 2
episode.summary: The Five continue their performance of "The Crane Repays a Debt." The Jizous from Kasajizou make a cameo appearance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 1
episode.summary: Farnese has a moment of self-realization as she tries to adjust to her change in circumstance. Her abrupt about-face surprises Guts and his comrades, but nothing prepares them for the surprise audience with a witch in the forest who seems to know everything about them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 8
episode.summary: Urashimatarou sneaks into the basement of Ryuuguu Castle, where he discovers a horrible crime. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 7
episode.summary: Urashimatarou, played by Porcini, saves a turtle being bullied at the beach. He`s invited to the castle at the bottom of the sea, where he meets Otohime. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 6
episode.summary: The Onitaigers set out to Onigashima for their decisive battle against the oni. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 5
episode.summary: Momotarou, played by Porcini, becomes friends with Kintarou, played by Mai. A third hero also joins them on their quest against the oni. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 12
episode.summary: The girls follow Mai into a book at her home. There, they run into the turtle, who’d been living in the folk tales the whole time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 11
episode.summary: The mushroom girls are all grown-up. They meet up for a reunion, but Mai is missing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 10
episode.summary: Urashimatarou and the princesses confront the evil mirror. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 9
episode.summary: Urashimatarou and the three captive princesses make a daring escape from Ryuuguu Castle, but they may have to go back. Source: crunchyroll
